properties.entry: select * from sc_supplier_evaluate where SUPPLIER_ID = '{@#supplierId#}' and meta_code = '{@#metaCode#}'
INSERT INTO sc_supplier_evaluate ( SUPPLIER_ID, META_CODE, SCORE, MEMO, CREATOR, CREATED_TIME ) VALUES ( '{@#supplierId#}', '{@#metaCode#}', '{@#score#}', '{@#memo#}', '{@#loginId#}', NOW() )
UPDATE sc_supplier_evaluate SET SUPPLIER_ID = '{@#supplierId#}' , META_CODE = '{@#metaCode#}' , SCORE = '{@#score#}' , MEMO = '{@#memo#}' WHERE ID = '{@#id#}'

SELECT sc_supplier.* , ( select sc_user.name from sc_user where sc_user.login_id = sc_supplier.creator ) as USERNAME, (SELECT sppd.REAL_QUOTE_PRICE FROM sc_purchase_plan_details sppd WHERE sppd.REAL_PROVIDOR = sc_supplier.ID AND sppd.REAL_QUOTE_PRICE IS NOT NULL ORDER BY sppd.ID DESC LIMIT 0,1) AS REAL_QUOTE_PRICE, (SELECT sppd.REAL_PURCHASE_DATE FROM sc_purchase_plan_details sppd WHERE sppd.REAL_PROVIDOR = sc_supplier.ID AND sppd.REAL_QUOTE_PRICE IS NOT NULL ORDER BY sppd.ID DESC LIMIT 0,1) AS REAL_PURCHASE_DATE FROM sc_supplier where 1=1 {@ and name like '%#name#%'} {@ and name like '%#NAME#%'} {@ and sc_supplier.id in ( select sps.supplier_id from sc_real_product_supplier sps where sps.real_sku = '#realSku#' )} {@ and ( name like '%#searchKey#%' or memo like '%#searchKey#%' or sc_supplier.id in ( select sps.supplier_id from sc_real_product_supplier sps , sc_real_product srp where srp.real_sku = sps.real_sku and ( sps.real_sku = '#searchKey#' or srp.name like '%#searchKey#%' ) ) or sc_supplier.id in ( select sps.supplier_id from sc_product_supplier sps , sc_product sp where sps.asin = sp.asin and ( sps.asin = '#searchKey#' or sp.title like '%#searchKey#%' ) ) ) }

SELECT sp.* FROM sc_real_product srp, sc_real_product_rel srpr, sc_amazon_account_product saap, sc_product_supplier sps, sc_supplier sp WHERE srp.id = srpr.REAL_ID AND srpr.SKU = saap.SKU AND sps.ASIN = saap.ASIN and sp.id = sps.supplier_id AND srp.REAL_SKU = '{@#realSku#}' union SELECT sp.* FROM sc_real_product srp, sc_real_product_supplier sps, sc_supplier sp where sps.real_sku = srp.real_sku and sp.id = sps.supplier_id AND srp.REAL_SKU = '{@#realSku#}'
INSERT INTO sc_real_product_supplier (REAL_SKU, SUPPLIER_ID, CREATE_TIME, CREATOR ) VALUES ('{@#sku#}', '{@#supplierId#}', NOW(), '{@#loginId#}' )

INSERT INTO sc_supplier (ID, NAME, CODE, ADDRESS, CONTACTOR, PHONE, EMAIL, ZIP_CODE, CREATOR, CREATE_TIME, URL, QQ, MOBILE, FAX, MEMO, PRODUCTS, EVALUATE ) VALUES ('{@#id#}', '{@#name#}', '{@#code#}', '{@#address#}', '{@#contactor#}', '{@#phone#}', '{@#email#}', '{@#zip_code#}', '{@#loginId#}', NOW(), '{@#url#}', '{@#qq#}', '{@#mobile#}', '{@#fax#}', '{@#memo#}', '{@#products#}', '{@#evaluate#}' )

UPDATE sc_supplier SET name = '{@#name#}' , code = '{@#code#}' , address = '{@#address#}' , contactor = '{@#contactor#}' , phone = '{@#phone#}' , email = '{@#email#}' , zip_code = '{@#zip_code#}' , url = '{@#url#}' , qq = '{@#qq#}' , mobile = '{@#mobile#}' , fax = '{@#fax#}' , memo = '{@#memo#}' , products = '{@#products#}', EVALUATE= '{@#evaluate#}'
WHERE ID = '{@#id#}'
